website_summaries.verdict: This space-saving washer/dryer combo is perfect for quickly drying delicates and small loads of laundry.
pros: Spins clothes dry in about 5 minutes
Can dry 6.6 pounds of laundry at a time
Compact size works well for dorms
cons: Some reports of leaks and difficulties reaching customer service

customer_reviews.title: This little machine is amazing. I did several loads by pouring in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is amazing. I did several loads by pouring in the water using a bucket. My brilliant sister came up with a solution using a dollar store turkey baster! Just cut off the narrow tip, insert it into the hose. Cut an X shape into the top and push it into your faucet. You need to watch the water pressure but this soulution is easy, cheap and doesn't require plumbing skills.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonsina

customer_reviews.title: A True Game Changer!  Small Living Life Saver :-)
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of hand washing, I was ready to quit! This is my review and demonstration of the Costway Twin Tub Washing Machine, sold through Giantex, available on Amazon. It's a wonderful little machine that's incredibly spacious and relatively quiet. It gets out even the toughest stains (my daughter loved yogurt and mac and cheese!) for 100 bucks. I was NOT endorsed for this video and I did NOT receive this item for free or at a discount. I reviewed it because I wanted to and I love spreading the word about good products that work and make women's lives easier! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Luther & Kaitlin McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: I like everything except length of the hose
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about two weeks. I am impressed with the quality. I like everything except length of the hose. For those trying to connect to the faucet, Buy these two items and enjoy washing :) 1) Faucet Adapter - I am unable to link Home depot link here. Google Neoperl 571493. Buy from the first link. 2) Hose mender - Google 56456 mender. Buy from the first link.
customer_reviews.author: bhavanishankar

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the bottom, burning smell after one month.
customer_reviews.text: My first review was good, but now it leaks badly and makes a burning smell when I use it. I want a replacement, but don't know where to ask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If the designers of this machine change the hoses too durable plastic this little machine would be awesome..
customer_reviews.text: I order this item on July 11th and received it July 14th...my machine leaked water everywhere in my kitchen...the seller sold me a used defective machine after mopping up excessives amounts of water...I inspected the bottom of the machine and noticed that there was two holes and rust on the cheap plastic drainage hose...The drainage hoses is a joke it's a thin plastic hose... Why would a company make an item that drains water with cheap plastic? If the designers of this machine change the hoses too durable plastic this little machine would be awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dubose

customer_reviews.title: The spin dry fills with water forcing me to tip it up side down
customer_reviews.text: My video says it all. I contacted the selling a few times with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little bummed, because I've used this washer a handful of times (no more than 10) and the spinner function stopped working today. I freaking loved this thing!! Like loved it! Now the spinner part just rattles back and forth and slams up against the wall of the washer. So frustrating. Waiting to hear what the seller has to say. :(
customer_reviews.author: hales

customer_reviews.title: It's working GREAT! it's pretty powerful and while the dryer doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have given this a 4 instead of a 5 is simply because I have to put it in my tub to use it haha. I just got it in today and have done a load of clothing as well at pet bedding. It's working GREAT! it's pretty powerful and while the dryer doesn't get the clothes 100% dry, it get them about 90%of the way. Would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Perez

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved it while it worked for about a month. I was careful not to overload it and keep it in good care. All of a sudden the machine hums, but the spinner and dryer do not work. There isn't support for this. It wasn't a huge setback but pretty disappointing when you loved it, counted on it then one day it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Baci

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Will Spin After Only Two Washes
customer_reviews.text: This is the probably the worst product I have purchased from Amazon. I did a very light load of personals, then two towels and I spun each towel by itself and then the thing stopped spinning. Nothing, nada, nope. It didn't even make it through three uses, so very disappointing. I had another machine in my cart, but went with this one instead and I'm sorry I did. Now I have to figure out if I can return it, from the negative reviews it doesn't seem easy to do. From now on I will stick to products that are Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: My machine arrived on December 28, 2017 and just after 5 washes the machine stopped spinning in both the wash basket and the spinning basket. I took time to choose this machine and I made my final decision based on the reviews and ratings and suffice to say I am not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C.

customer_reviews.title: We bought this washing machine in May 2017 and by ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this washing machine in May 2017 and by December, we had changed the pipe tube for drainage twice and it still leaks profusely after drainage when spinning. My whole kitchen numerous times have become so wet. After we changed the tubes for the second time, we now have to buy another a new washer because it is becoming unbearable with the leakage.
customer_reviews.author: posh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: We love it especially after grandpa built a wooden frame so we it drains in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: yirgalem

customer_reviews.title: Spinner broke
customer_reviews.text: Spinner broke after 11 uses and I only spin a little at a time. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: chellebelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, tho. No pump water. I added bed raisers so I can get most water out into the bucket and until fill up and pour in the tub once or twice. Easy to do instead pick up and set on the tub everytime
customer_reviews.author: Tadd

customer_reviews.title: Received it cracked at the bottom. I started to ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it cracked at the bottom. I started to fill it with water and noticed the water leaking out on the floor, luckily before there was too much of a mess. Now I have to go through the process of returning this large machine. Luckily I kept the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like melting plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cons: The machine immediately began to fill my house with a strong odor of burning plastic. I’ve used it two more times since buying it, but the smell has not gone away. It stinks when I walk by it, even after not being used for a week. I’m returning it: Also, the hose it came with is useless so I spent more money finding a way to hose the water from my kitchen sink. Pretty disappointed. Pros: I love the size and the weight (I can easily carry it into another room to store when not using it). It washes a nice amount of clothes for a single person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Ever Worth every Penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this because of the Coronavirus and did want to use the laundry-mat in my building. It works so well I would recommend this product if you live in apartments it is so easy to use works on any clothes sheets towels and even jeans 👖. My best by EVER!!!!!🥰😍🥰🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Meauhead

customer_reviews.title: Worked great up till then but even at around $100 I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it in mid August and just shy of mid January both the motors just stopped working without warning. The timers still work and I can hear it manually clicking between the direction for the wash cycle. Worked great up till then but even at around $100 I expect it to work longer then 5 months. I will update if I can get the motors working again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Boyle

customer_reviews.title: simple is better
customer_reviews.text: I got this compact washer and dryer because i could not afford a stack-able washer and dryer .I remember using a compact washer in Tunisia when i visited there and so i looked it up here and found this model washer spin model .It was affordable and from my experience knew they work just as good as any other expensive washer and dryer do.I wanted a large tub to hold a good amount of clothes and a powerful spinner to dry clothes because right now I hang dry clothing no dryer.here are pictures on how i set it up in my tub .
customer_reviews.author: Katrina N.

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little washer, and got some great use out of it. It's not the easiest machine to use, because of having to put the water in and drain it out. That's not the fault of the appliance, that's just an issue with any portable washer. It's reliable, and once you get used to it you find a rhythm for how to run everything in an efficient way. I didn't give five stars because there are some features that could be a little better, including making the machine easier to clean out/clear water out. I have zero regrets about purchasing, and would recommend this washer.
customer_reviews.author: Katdi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I want to reinforce what the thousands of reviews already posted have said. This is my favorite investment of 2020. As home laundry delivery is halted or cancelled due to Covid, this is an AMAZING solution for a small household to be able to regularly do laundry without shelling out thousands for a huge washer and dryer. This thing is fast, small, quiet, but powerful. I did a full week of laundry within an hour. (The spin dryer is amazing also, and it definitely gets clothes 95% dry). Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: EBarnett509

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: As the container is too small, it fits good for cleaning underware, or one jacket. The price was not expensive before. I remember that it was around $109 or $129. I remembered the old price and I did not notice that they made big price increase. When I made order, I did not notice that they made big price increase. I was hooked up. Those reviews were made when the price was cheaper. This product is good at $110 or 120 level but no good at $200 level. They sell much better reliable washer at $399 at home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for small spaces or in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: Our washer broke right before the pandemic started and we didn't want to go out to the stores. Perfect little machine. One load = pair of jeans, couple shirt, couple of under wear, couple of pairs of socks. Or Two queen size sheets and two pillow cases. If you use the normal cycle clothes gets tied up in knots. Soft cycle works better and cleans well. Spin cycle is EXCELLENT, clothes comes out damp if you put in half your wash load. Hook up was a snap, I installed in garage bath room sink, draining into shower and that's where it'll stay for the duration. Will upload photos if I figure out how.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about three days now and it started leaking and there is smoke coming out of it. It is really loud and vibrates the whole room. I really wanted to like this product because I wanted to use it for my son’s cloth diapers. Am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to see me through COVID quarantine. I live in a City and did not want to take my laundry downstairs to a shared laundry room or send it out through a service. I am delighted! The machine works better than I hoped. It is quiet. Effective. And fairly good looking! As one of the video reviewers notes, the key is to elevate the unit -- for me, I bought a shelf (on wheels) to set the machine above the level of my tub where the machine drains. I will continue to use this unit after I am able to leave my apartment -- High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good for the right situation....
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you are in a pinch and have no alternative to do laundry. That's about it really. It works and will get things clean, but washing delicate or expensive things is RISKY. It looks like it ruined a sweater of mine, although I knew putting it in was risky. It's not really a hassle to use or anything, I just think most people are actually better off buying their own washer and dryer due to how much better they clean and treat clothes. Obviously this thing will have you spending more time doing laundry since it takes small loads. Drying is the biggest pain.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Saver, Hoses are cheap
customer_reviews.text: Too keep it simple, this thing is a beast and almost feels too good to be true. Pros -handles decent sized loads -spin dry is really effective and fast -fills up quick if you have a bucket or hose Cons -kinda loud and sometimes vibrates -the hoses are really cheap so be gentle or they will tear or rip. -doesn't come with a sink extension to fill up through the hose they give you. Bust!
customer_reviews.author: Jama

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life???
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little piece of household equipment. I set it up in my guest bathroom shower. All of the negative comments about the hose (and also the power cord) being too short and too whimpy are 109% accurate. And if I could take 1/2 star off for that, but I don't know how. It is not enough to reduce by a whole star! I love this addition to my laundry. I don't have to carry all of my laundry from upstairs, downstairs, and down to the basement. I do smaller loads and more frequently, but my items get so wonderfully clean that it just makes me smile!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Lightweight, Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: We've used this washer since Feb of 2018. It has been great for smaller loads. Downsides, although small: 1. Spin side doesn't fit a full wash load 2. The hose is thin and fragile(ours has a small hole). We use the washer inside a bathtub, so draining is not a problem. This washer is light enough that teens and adults can move it without a problem. I do feel that it cannot properly clean larger thick towels.
customer_reviews.author: FeatheredNoTar

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My clothes came out very clean. I load the water with a bucket thou since the hose it came with doesn't fit my sink. I don't consider that to be much of a bother since it cleans very well and it is very portable. Works well for me since I am in a city that it now in quarantine. I am very much pleased. The spinner works well also. It drains the water out but it doesn't dry. I am hang drying my clothes for now but may look into a portable dryer as well in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: This item worked great, but completely stopped working after the 4th use
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great, but completely stopped working after the 4th use. I would recommend trying a different product then this as it is also unlikely to be replaced. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HANDY PRODCUT
customer_reviews.text: The product was great and quiet in the beginning when it was working properly. Eventually, the machine started leaking and making a terrible grinding noise. NOTE: Underwear and black clothes usually need to be washed twice, (2 x 15Mins) and rinsed twice. Or anything that tends to get more sweaty. Then they come out smelling fresh. Although I had a problem, the company was great and expedient in rectifying the problem. I would definitely give this product a try since the company backs their product.
customer_reviews.author: MB.5

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Noooooooo. Good idea but cheaply made. All hoses way way toooo short , cord too short, tried to make accomodation with USA products but you cannot do. So you end up sticking it in the closet, sad. It is cheap but you get what you pay for. I did not want to put any stars but had to put one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this machine for use in our RV, at the recommendation of a friend and fellow camper. We have not used this in our RV yet, but have given it two test runs on the back patio at home, where it performed flawlessly in both cases. It is easy to use, and performs very well; exceeding our expectations considering its size and light weight. We look forward to giving it a real-life test when we next hit the road in our RV for an extended period of time. A good machine for a good price, making it a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive Customer Service; Machine works great, until it doesn't. Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in January, washing machine stopped spinning in March. Requested a return/replacement and received no response, over a week later. Sent second request. The initial purchase was easy, item arrived quickly and as ordered. Setup was easy, worked great. Until it didn't. But for only getting three month's of use, it is giving me buyer's remorse. These compact washers from all manufacturer's don't seem to have much of a life cycle. I've used many and they're all cheap crap. Lasting the longest was the Panda and it only worked for about a year. Thinking next I will just purchase the spin dryer separately and expect to replace the washer piece every 6 mos to a year.
customer_reviews.author: LYN SMITH

customer_reviews.title: SO far SO good.
customer_reviews.text: I have read all the reviews on this and others. Most say how it breaks very easily. So far mine has worked great. If the water is not deep enough the cloths knot up. I see a lot of reviews say its hard to rinse the clothes. I run them twice and then in the spin I put the water on them for a couple of minutes as they spin, then turn off for the dry spin. The spin cycle does dry them very well.
customer_reviews.author: Billyk

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Washer
customer_reviews.text: This washer is very impressive for a little thing and especially being so inexpensive! There are some quirks that you have to figure out, but then it works very well. Don’t fill either portion too full, especially the spin basket. The spinner is so incredible, how fast it spins and how much water it gets out of the close. This washer gets everything so clean! We purchased this for use in our RV, and it’s easy to just fill the washer by hand with the detachable shower head. We did have a couple issues, but the customer service from this company was so excellent, we would definitely purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: KourtE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-Spinner quits after 2 months-UGH
customer_reviews.text: Love this washer and the spin dryer is fantastic! I just am up dating this because my spinner just stopped working. I love this machine but now I can not use the spinner. It makes noise but does not spin. I just used it a few minutes before and the second handful of clothes it would not budge. BUMMER
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest daughter lives in a small apartment with her bf and it has no washer or dryer. We got this mainly to get her by from weekend to weekend for her work clothes, etc. So far this machine has saved them time and money as she/they have started using it for slightly larger loads. They still have to go to their local laundromat but don’t spend anywhere near the money they did before! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Mcintire

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for over two years and it still works like a champ. We use it multiple times a day, every day. We have a family of six, use coth diapers for our youngest, and our second youngest is a bed wetter, so that means we've got three to four loads of laundry to wash. Every. Single. day. This thing has managed to keep up with all of it. Im thoroughly impressed with how well its held up.
customer_reviews.author: Joel & Amber

customer_reviews.title: I received a bad machine.. but customer service was great
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it and was trying to do my first wash... nothing... its not working. Contacted the vendor and i was told to send in a video???? Video of what? Its not working!!! I am not going to put in my clothes again just to take a video then do a hand wash again. I bought because of all the good reviews but I received a machine that doesn’t work. Wash doesn’t work and the spin dry doesn’t work. Update: 7.23.19 ok so i am bummed out about the defective machine but the vendor was quick with their reply and have issued me a full refund. So for their customer service i rate them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today (very fast shipping) and have only done 1 load and I’m super impressed. The agitation is great, clothes are clean! 4 stars due to inlet hose being practically useless. I just took off the shower head and put that hose in over the side. Also drain hose is a bit short. We are in an rv so it doesn’t quite fit into shower. I put it on an ottoman and have the hose in shower. I also wish you could spin the whole washed load at once, but you have to do it in halves. That’s ok though, beats the laundromat in these difficult virus times. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Is it really worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Received this today after some scheduling mix up. The team told me that the quality of their products was important. The box was impeccable, not a dent on it. The product itself? Damaged. It looks like someone tried to put their foot through it. I can’t just unscrew it and fix it because the pieces are chipped and will no longer screw in. I must say after being assured of the quality of the product I’m extremely disappointed. Update 1: Company has not apologized or attempted to send a replacement/replacement parts. I urge you all to pick another option. They do not care about their customers or the quality of their product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4Days

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, but stopped working out of nowhere. I trie to follow the video that I looked up to make a repair/adjustment...but that didn't resolve my issue. I'm giving this 4 stars because the merchant responded quickly to help me, and when it still couldn't be fixed, I received a full refund. So I took my refund and applied it to their more fancy model, and it was well worth it. Sometimes things just break on their own, there's no such thing as a perfect product, but I give the merchant 5 stars for all their effort. P.S. my friend bought this model and it's still working beautifully for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: ... my apartment so this can drain directly down the waste pipe. I haven't been to the laundromat since ...
customer_reviews.text: I built a shelf above the w/d hookups in my apartment so this can drain directly down the waste pipe. I haven't been to the laundromat since I bought it several months ago. Works great for one person. Sometimes the water sloshes to the top of the basin and drips down the outside when the machine is running. This could be fixed by applying silicon around the top lip of the machine. Would have gotten 5 stars if it came sealed. So far it hasn't been a big problem, as I just wipe up the water after each load, but it is rather annoying. Overall, this thing paid for itself in a couple of months. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!! Not paid by anyone to write this.
customer_reviews.text: Love, we've only had it a little over 2 weeks now. Was worried it would break, it hasn't and we live it! It's very primitive and simple... but that's what we love about it. We've sincerely recommend it to our friends who live in same apartment building. Get worried with reviews that seem to good to be true- just an fyi we're not paid, endorsed or anything. Honestly just works great. Came with really light weight tubing, went to home depot and got studier tubing. You can just use shower head (we have a detachable or extra head on ours) if you really want. But the new tubing works great too...
customer_reviews.author: mrspanish

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, shoddy machine
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to have this machine after all the good reviews. My experience was not great with the machine, Worked beautifully the first time, I was beyond thrilled with how well it worked the first use. Then stopped working half way through the second use. The company asked if I'd like a refund or to sent me a new one, but that one was defective right out of the box as well. The replies from the company were very quick, they did work with me, they were very polite, and they did issue me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Austin

customer_reviews.title: This Is My Second Purchase. I HATE This Machine.
customer_reviews.text: Update-This machine must’ve came from a different place than the first machine I purchased.I wrote the 2nd review of this product before I opened the box assuming it was just like the first machine I ordered. This machine smelled so bad and after cleaning it over and over the smell won’t come out. It also had some yellow residue in it and I’m so pissed off. I don’t even want to use the machine. Disgusting. I loved the first machine because it came clean and worked well. This machine is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: EXPOSED

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all right out of the box :(
customer_reviews.text: I received this item quickly but was soon very disappointed. The first issue right out of the box was a large crack on the inside of dryer/spinner (see picture). I tried the washer anyway, since the crack only seemed cosmetic and didnt affect the dryer/spinner. Anyway, I loaded the washer with a few clothing items, soap and water.....The only thing that happed was a humming noise and no motor agitation to wash the clothes. I've troubleshooted every possible thing...it just doesn't work. I'm about to contact the company so stay tuned for an update on that outcome. But for now, I'll have to say, DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyFL79

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: When Covid hit, I didn’t want to venture outside my apartment and down to the laundry room. So I purchased this in early March, and I am so glad I did! It can be a little noisey but it’s not bad. I put it in my tub. I purchased a shower head with a wand to make it easy to fill the machine. It is best to do smaller loads, but I’ve done full loads with light items. The spinner is amazing. I use it for 1 minute. That’s all it takes. Then I hang dry my clothes. If I wash in the morning by the evening my clothes are dry.
customer_reviews.author: K. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Little washer that could
customer_reviews.text: I realized quickly that laundromats were the worst. After hunting a bit I choose this one. I have a bad back so I was a bit worried it would be hard to maneuver, happily that’s not a problem. The next trick was getting the adapter for my shower head. Locally didn’t have one so I got a $2 to tide me over. Remember to make sure the drain switch is closed/off before you start filling the washer. Then remember to let the drain hose down when using. (I was excited to see the machine in action). I love it 10 out of 10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Powerful wash. Spinner is equally wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It's been serving me awesomely for almost a year now. Incredibly powerful washing power despite the smaller size in comparison to traditional washers. The spinner is mind-blowing (I'm simple..) with how it dries the clothing out and barely has any traces of feeling damp at all. I'm always so impressed, hahah. My set up is just plopping it into my shower. (I have noodle arms but can still manage the weight.) Then I have the tube to insert the water have a sandwich bag "funnel" tied to it by a hair band. Nothing fancy, but as long as it gets the job done and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this now for several months. I love it!!!! I saved the Styrofoam base that it was packaged in and use it to reduce any noise it makes in my bath tub (since I live on a 3rd floor). I have had no issues and have washed all types of things from queen sheets to jeans and heavy items such as sweat shirts, etc... It holds a lot more than I imagined. The spinner is better than a full size washer. Any item dries fast, usually within hours, even jeans and heavy items. I love it!! The price is worth it! I shopped around for months prior to purchasing this one. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: perfect replacement for trip to laundramat
customer_reviews.text: Write your review i have found this is good for doing weeks worth of small cloths. or if you need ssomething washed right away.. the spin dryer works great. but need to be sure load is balanced. again small loads. single towels,or sheets.. we placed the unit on a tv stand roll it in to the bath room to fill and drain in the tub. and hang the cloths to dry on an indoor clothsline. this saves me from having to make that trip to the laundra mat where you sit a wait. this works for my wife and i. if you do not have washer dryer hook ups it is worth it. i hope this was helpful to somebody
customer_reviews.author: Daren C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use in my RV. Moving forward this will be my primary washing method. I am still getting used to the machine, the first time I used this machine I used way too much soap even trying to be careful. The only complaint I have right now is that the directions were terrible. Otherwise, at this point I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WanderlustMel

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine did not work when I first received it. The company who made it replied right away with YouTube tutorials to check the wiring etc. Which was easy to do. It is now working and I did a small load. Clothes came out really clean and not soaking wet after spin cycle. I do use a bucket to fill it with and keep it in the bathtub as the drain hose is too short to leave it next to sink. I'm 66 year old woman and can easily lift it in and out of the tub and carry it. I believe it weighs 28 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda King

customer_reviews.title: Bad machine, Spin botton don't work at 9 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad machine,Spin botton don't work at 9 months after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Hongjian Pu

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, great customer service. Mine came domaged and they gave me most of my money back, I can't complain. Good thing to have, it washes and spins real good. I brought a shower line to connect the hose since it won't fit in the pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Nazaire

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: PSA This is one of the best investments I've ever made. I really love it. It fits in my bathroom perfectly. I use a bucket to drain the water out because the hose is on the opposite side of the tub. But aside from that, It's a great purchase. If you have babies, small children, limited space, don't like taking your clothes to a laundromat or can't afford a washer and or dryer. THIS IS THE PRODUCT FOR YOU !!!! OMG I'm so pleased. P.S. When using the spin part to dry the clothes it does it very well. I washed a few loads today, hung them up and it's already dry. That was 4 hrs ago 🤗🤗🤗
customer_reviews.author: BEANS

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy when I received the washer. I did one load with no issues and thought it would be perfect for our small apartment.. today I went to do another load to end up with the machine smoking and a burnt plastic smell consuming the room.. will not be using again due to the fact that I no longer feel safe to do so .. very disappointed with what we got for what we paid .. we overall got one load out of the machine before no longer being able to use it.. I would not recommend this product not only because it stopped working after one load but because I do not feel as though it is safe
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: It changed everything for me
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and to save money and time going to the laundromat, I hand wash my clothes. I got this laundry machine. It has completely changed my life and my laundry. No cranking, no real work, and works so much better than my hand machine, I was so surprised how much better it worked. It was kind of difficult to find the right set up for the water, the electricity, and the draining, but once I got the right shelf and extensions, it all works out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it does not
customer_reviews.text: Received March 23, 2020 use to wash delicates, shirts and workout outfits. I use it twice a week and only put 2-3 pieces in the tub. Today July 5 less than 4 months it stopped working. While it worked it did a good job. A filter would help. Return window is closed and I will be looking for a better washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Manual mispelled words like they have a different language and very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Manual mispelled words like they have a different language and very difficult to understand ...Called manufacturer and we stiil havent received operation manual..Otherwise IMPRESSED AS H.LL Using a dollar tree turkey baster to hook up to kitchen faucet...since I live in apt The company should inform the buyer about hooking up to faucet etc because it doesnt come with any thing to thread to for water and also I am using a memory foam bath cushion on the back against the sink and a matchbook in the spin side cover to avoid noise and the pillow to avoid bumping against cupboard
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Okay I just received this today in record time. Said delivery was two weeks but got it in about four days. I’ve washed one load with some shirts and shorts and delicates and the spinner left them nearly dry. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Greenwalt

customer_reviews.title: No issues so far, great on Yacht
customer_reviews.text: Great washer we use on our Yacht. We got it today and washed 5 loads of cloths with no issues. Had to extend the drain hose by 12 ft to drain overboard. Drain hose is 1 1/4 ID hose with 1 1/4 ID hose barb to connect them together. Could not use the water fill hose because the rubber connector was to small and the quick connect was the wrong connector for our faucet. (male connector on faucet with female connector provided).
customer_reviews.author: Tommyyamaha

customer_reviews.title: Great small washer. Less water, less power, less time!
customer_reviews.text: Yesssssss! No more laundromat for this girl! Except when there are dirty blankets or xl winter gear. This thing is a winner. It gets the clothes good and clean. You don't need running water so you could take it camping or use if your lines are out. It requires very little electricity , 100 watts does several large loads in this if they're minimally soiled. Sturdy, drains well, has a pint catcher. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: leeann stenger

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: This product holds more than I expected. We are a family of six who is currently living in a camper. While quite a few loads are required to keep up, it can be done. The machine provides surprising agitation power, and the water extractor will make lightweight, athletic materials come out almost dry. My biggest complaint, despite the good agitation, is the overall cleaning ability. It's not unusual to find grass clippings or other debris still on the clothing afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Buhner

customer_reviews.title: Needs gravity to help release water from machine
customer_reviews.text: It cleans well and the spinning side gets most of the water out. It's pretty quiet compared to full sized washers. I needed to put it up on top of something in equal or greater height than my tub because it depends on gravity to let all the water go, or else it just stays in the machine. However you work it, the tube to release the water has to go downward. I also took a note from the other reviewers and used the rubber bulb from a baster to be able to fit it onto my water source.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good 4 months until it broke!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 4 months and then the drain broke so I had to keep the tube up when it was washing and put it down when it drained. Then the spinner started to fill too. Eventually the spinner stopped working. Contacted the seller with no response. Super frustrating, I know plastic machines won’t last forever but 4 -5 months is not ok.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Love this washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful alternative to a full sized washer. It handles about a half a standard load, and is quick and easy to work with. The manual is rubbish, true, but it's not rocket science to figure out how to use this thing. The spinner itself is worth the money, it practically dries the clothes out without the stretching and tearing which can happen in a regular sized washer. It would be a perfect addition to a travel trailer. Frugal with the water, low power consumption, and clothes that can be hung to dry. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JayeB

customer_reviews.title: One month and I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but it was missing the piece that suppose to lay on top of the spin cycle, I purchased a flat wheeled mover for this to sit on. It easily rolls now from my utility room to my kitchen sink to fill. Its amazing how much this little thing holds. I can't believe how clean my clothes come out. The spin cycle really gets the excess water out. If it lasts I will really be in love.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger D. Streeval

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my review. It had stopped working and I began the return process. I opened the back of the machine and found a small leak. I think that leak got wires or maybe the motor wet, because it quit spinning in both sides. After resealing the area where I found the trickle, and letting it dry out. It is working again. It’s small in size, and gets us by. Especially while stuck home on quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy G

customer_reviews.title: When draining the hose is at the bottom so it empties by gravity the hose can adapt to either side.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little machine. I wait for several months to post my review. I can honestly say it works better than my large washer it's easy on water and electricity. It's also my opinion it gets my clothes cleaner than my large washer. If for some reason it stopped working I would buy another one to replace it. Takes up little room in my kitchen so linens are always clean and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little machine that's perfect for my tiny apartment. I didn't buy any adapters for it because I use my detachable shower head to fill it. Only takes a few minutes to fill, and after 2 minutes, my clothes were spun drier than at the laundromat. It's gravity drain, so I just let the grey water go down the tub. It's less than 20 pounds so it's easy to put away when you're done. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: tf0708

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this machine
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this machine. I've waited a few months to write a review because I wanted to give and accurate representation of my experience with the product. This is a solid performer as long as you don't overfill it. I personally fill the washing compartment with water add soap then add my cloths. After the wash, I drain it with my clothes still inside and refill it with more water to get out the excess soap. Finally, I place some clothes in the spin dryer for a few minutes and hang them up to air dry. 5 out of 5 from a busy New Yorker,
customer_reviews.author: X. Laster

customer_reviews.title: It's a game changer for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this so I could stay home without having to go out during the covid-19 pandemic. And I'm very impressed and glad with my choice! Very simple to use! It fits right inside my stall shower (stand-up) all I do is take my shower head off its hose and fill it! I do have to put it on a sturdy platform so the washer can drain. The spin feature on this is magnificent! The clothes almost are completely dry, bearly damp! I'm so happy with the ease and simplicity of this product! Very light weight and easy to move! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ShopAholic

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this washer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This washer I was very skeptical about. Well it is great! It is very powerful and gets clothes so clean. It washes one large sheet, about five shirts, mabe two pair of jeans. The spinner doesn't hold as much but it's no problem spinning a few at a time. It spins so good the clothes take no time to dry. You have to elevate it to get it to drain, so I put it on top of a plastic storage tub and it worked great. It drains really fast. I highly recommend this washer it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how much I love this thing! It is lightweight and easy to use, however the instructions that came with it were absolutely useless. It works well and the spin dryer works so we’ll that I almost don’t have to hang dry my clothes. I am very impressed with this machine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini work horse
customer_reviews.text: Love this washer. I use it 2-3 times a week. Washes the clothes. The spinner is a dream. It gets the clothes to a damp stage. Let them hang overnight and dry! I only wish it had a pump so I could keep it on the floor. I have it sitting on a piano bench by the bath tub when I use it because it needs to drain into the bath tub. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The product is compact, light, yet fits a decent amount of clothing. it is a definite must-have for every apartment without a washer. The spinner is extremely strong and will literally beat the water out of all clothing. once I spin the clothes, I hang them for a couple of hours and they come out crispy dry as if they came out of a dryer. Cons: I received the product clearly used and embellished with multiple scratches/stains. However, I reached out to customer service and they rectified the situation by offering me a partial refund. Once I tested the product multiple times to make sure it works, I accepted the refund and chose to keep the washer.
customer_reviews.author: juliana

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this washing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 2 years now and I love it. I live in an apartment and this lives in my bathroom. I went to home depot and got a long piece of clear hose cut and I run the hose from my bathroom sink to the washer. I'm also really short, and this machine is just perfect for me. I can wash almost anything in it, except big blankets and comforters. I've washed jeans, towels, and sheets just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Neighbors will hear it, so if not allowed to have a washer in apartments...they will know. Otherwise, works great. Learned to double rinse to avoid clothes drying crunchy, but gets my clothes clean. Great for rainy days when you dont want to go to laundromat. Small, so washing frequently. Recommend for one person, MAYBE two. More than that, would mean SO many loads every day.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little wash machine I’ve ever had it does exactly what it says it does I used to live in Mexico so there’s are kind of like this I have it sitting outside under my clothes line when I’m done washing I spend them and just hang them directly on the line I never use the dryer so this is the best thing I’ve ever gotten in my whole entire life thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Loulou62

customer_reviews.title: Still worth the value
customer_reviews.text: Well it has been a while using it with a weekly use. Been a month and the spinning cycle side is leaking all the water out the bottom. The drain hose is way to weak and did not last long at all. But... as long as i put the machine in my shower/tub/outside it works great. The only downfall to the machine is the drain hose itself. Easy to get around.
customer_reviews.author: Fergsgecko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the realistic user
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for skipping the laundry mat! This little washer is quick and surprisingly quiet. Yes, it is small and you'll need to run more loads, but for the price and size it has been a great purchase for our RV. The washer discharge cycle really shows the dirt removal with minimal soap use and the spinner gets the clothes surprisingly dry during the 5 minute cycle...ready for hanging or further drying. Tub can be filled by bucket or supply tub and the same for additional rinsing during the spin. The time saved to be able to wash our clothes at "home" is money well spent and the space sacrifice is tolerable...even when every inch and pound matters.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this little Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is more powerful than my regular washing machine. My clothes are so much cleaner. this little guy is powerful plus you can respin the load multiple times until you feel the clothes are clean to your liking. My electric bill went down 40 bucks the first month from not running the big machine and dryer. I just hang clothes on the shower rod now. Buy One !!! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nidey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Great for small loads, makes a lot of noise when washing clothes, the spinner makes some noise when it starts spinning but then it goes super quiet, you will need something to hang the clothes on when out of the spinner because even though they feel dry they are not, in my opinion it does a better job at washing clothes than the laundromat machines. I paid $ 213.00 for it to then find out before the pandemic they were selling for as low as $ 60.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer/spinner. Wish I would have discovered it sooner. It's a little more work but it's worth it not to go to the laundromat. The power is great! The spinner gets things fairly dry. You will save on laundry soap because you need very little in this machine. I would recommend not over loading it. The most important thing is to watch a couple of YouTube tutorials to see how to operate the machine. There are also little tricks that you can do to hook the machine up to make it easier. It is lightweight and can be moved around easily. Did I say I love it?
customer_reviews.author: Tenia

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying if living without space for full size washer.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Received in time frame given. Product is sturdy but not to heavy. I am 69 and can maneuver it fairly easy. Wish the drain hose was longer but managed by adding an extra length to it. Probably would be ok if close to your drain but I only have so much room for it and didn't want to keep moving it back and forth. Excellent purchase if living in small place and limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Black

customer_reviews.title: Beats the laundromat
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this thing! I have been careful not to overload it so it’s been taking me a long time to complete laundry. I fill the washer up with a bucket but I read reviews so I expected to do that when I bought it. I’m able to keep it in my bathtub because I only use my standing shower. It’s a spin dryer people. Not an electric dryer. But it works really well. It’s squeezes everything out so nice I just pop it into my portable mini electric dryer and bam I’m done. Blankets won’t fit in the spin dryer . It’s a little problem for me right now. Beats the laundromat
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maddox

customer_reviews.title: It Works, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I got the package today with no busts or tears in the box (this is relevant, I swear lol) and it works amazingly! I washed a pair of jeans just for fun and I am thoroughly impressed! And it fits right in my bathroom, which is saying something since it’s not the widest room in the world. With that said, when I got the package the back was completely busted and the plastic of the washer tore Off of a screw. I was able to fix it so it looked less sad (see photos). The drain tube came dirty, and there was a hair in the wash tub, but I suppose it could be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Mean Amidala

customer_reviews.title: Giantex Portable mini washer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our travel trailer and this washer is amazing . It washes the clothes fast and really spins dry very good . I usually wash a pair of jeans two shirts 4socks and 2 under garments at the time and it handles them well. Also cleans clothes very good . Would recommend if you have limited space . Have also used at hotel that I was staying in a week.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Update: It's almost one year later and this washer is still working as great as it did when I first got it! It was definitely worth the money! This thing is amazing!!! Laundromats are not an option for me. I have a 5 year old Autistic boy and neither of us would leave sane. So this was the best option aside from driving 3 hours to my mom's house to wash. This washer cleans really well! I'm surprised with the power this machine packs. The spinner gets so fast and pulls 95% of the water out! This is the best purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Poole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces/apartments
customer_reviews.text: Pros: compact size, washes clothes thoroughly, amazing spinner - leave clothes 75 -80% dry, quick wash and spin cycles, work well with powder/liquid or laundry detergent pods, good for shirts, bottoms, workout/lounge-wear, sheets, small towels, delicate and children's clothes, Cons: tiny water inlet hose that is not compatible with most faucets, gravity draining means that you have to have the machine elevated to properly drain, you may need to tilt the machine to ensure all water is properly drained, small loads at a time Overall impressions: very convenient and super easy to use (despite poorly written instructions), reasonably price solution for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Tallie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Washer Didn't Last and Giantex Didn't Respond
customer_reviews.text: I liked this washing machine until the spinner quit working after only eight months. The seller never returned contact. The worst part is that instead of working with me to replace a part, the entire appliance- plastic casing and all- will go to the dump. It saves space in the house but takes up a lot more in the landfill because no one will troubleshoot the device and it sure didn't last as long as my Panda.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apartment dwelling
customer_reviews.text: Great agitation. Great spin. Read some of the reviews on here where people describe how to use it best. Pick up a good drying rack and you dont have to go to the laundromat except to wash bulky items like comforters. Tip: couldnt get the "line in" to work for filling so I just use a bucket. The drain is gravity so you need to elevate your machine. I used cinder blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Nate A

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this washer for multiple loads multiple times in the past month. You can wash several pants and shirts, but make sure you check that the washer spins. If it doesn’t spin the load is too large/heavy so just open it and remove some items. It requires probably half the amount of detergent/softener that a bigger washer uses. The spinner works great and leaves the clothes without dripping. I’ve washed pants, shirts, sweaters/hoodies, towels, small blankets, socks, underwear and I have not seen any damage to the items. I have not noticed any leaks. The hose didn’t work so well for me so I use warm/cold water that I fill in a small bucket and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Marbs

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great I absolutely love this... Perfect for small apartments... Dorm rooms .. or RVs ... And it might be my most favorite thing I own right now... Only thing is it's time consuming... I add the water in myself with a bucket and drain into a bucket..then you also have to drain in toilet... I don't want to drain in bathtub because of the fact there's lint that comes out and I don't want it clogging up my back tub... And a little noisy not to bad tho ...Over All I Love it and would definitely purchase again 😊
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, efficient and cost-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this miniature size washing machine, the second basket that comes with it or that’s already attached is kind of like a spinner/dryer and it actually dries our clothes about 85 to 90% so by the time I put the clothes in the dryer the miniature size dryer that we brought along with this washing machine. the clothes in the dryer within one load. I’m so grateful for this little dryer and this little washing machine that we brought from Amazon you will not regret it all you have to do is take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: T.I.
